long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TLDW is a Chrome extension that saves you time by providing concise summaries of YouTube videos and articles. Quickly get key points or full summaries, perfect for students, professionals, and casual readers.

Features:

- 5 Points Summary: Get the five most important points from any video or article.
- 10 Points Summary: Gain detailed insights with the ten most crucial points.
- Full Summary: Receive a comprehensive summary of the entire content.
- Interactive Q&A: Ask questions about the content and get detailed answers in real-time.
- Subscription Plans: Unlock more features with a subscription.
- Easy License Activation: Activate your license key for unlimited usage.

Benefits:

- Save Time: Quickly summarize lengthy videos and articles.
- Enhance Productivity: Focus on essential information.
- Improve Learning: Dive deeper into content and clarify doubts with Q&A.
- Cost-Effective: Affordable subscription plans offering great value.

How It Works:

Install the TLDW extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Open a YouTube video or article.
Use the tabs to select 5 Points, 10 Points, Summary, or Q&A.
Subscribe and activate your license key for unlimited tokens.
